data.actual_result: Invite shown as expired, immediately after sent. [Submitted for austinhuang#1076]
data.short_description: Just-created invites and old still-valid invites of my own server goes expire on my device (PC Canary)
data.steps_to_repro: - Step 1 Make an invite from a channel of my server, regardless of options - Step 2 Copy it and paste it somewhere and send it
